prompts.value: To send your summary order, what is your email?
To confirm your booking, we'll need your email. What is it?
Please provide your email so we can send you the booking.
To complete your booking, kindly share your email address.
May I know your name, please?
What should I call you? Your name, please.

speech: Thanks for choosing our services. Your booking summary and payment information will be sent to your email within the next 24 hours. Have a fantastic day and make the most of your Bali adventure!

Thank you for entrusting us with your booking. Look out for your booking summary and payment particulars in your email within the next 24 hours. Wishing you a fantastic day and an amazing Bali experience!
We appreciate your booking. You can expect to receive your booking summary and payment details in your inbox within the next 24 hours. Wishing you a wonderful day and an enjoyable Bali experience!
Your order is greatly appreciated. You'll receive your booking summary and payment details via email within the next 24 hours. We hope you have a delightful day and a fantastic time exploring Bali!
